list.abs: 苍白螺旋体感染的病原体是苍白螺旋体(Treponema pallidum)，是一种对人有严重致病性的螺旋体，能侵犯任何器官，产生各种症状。 …

means.word_mean: 1. spirochete that causes disease in humans (e.g. syphilis and yaws)

auth_sentence.content: Causes of syphilis Syphilis is a sexually transmitted infection caused by a bacteria known as Treponema pallidum.
